results.title: Statin use and incident erectile dysfunction--A nationwide propensity-matched cohort study in Taiwan.
results.text_hl: Further analysis demonstrated that statin users in the group of middle-aged (40-49 years old) or high-potency statin treated (i.e., @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) had lower HR for incident @<m>DISEASE_Erectile_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007172 @@@ED@@@.
